snippet: SCALIA--Antonin. Xavier High School mourns the passing of Antonin Scalia, Class of 1953, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court and member of the Xavier Hall of Fame. Our prayers go out to his wife Maureen, his family, and the Court. May Nino rest in God's peace. John C. Meditz '66, Board Chair; Dan Denihan '65, Vice Chair; Jack Raslowsky, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCALIA--Antonin. Xavier High School mourns the passing of Antonin Scalia, Class of 1953, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court and member of the Xavier Hall of Fame. Our prayers go out to his wife Maureen, his family, and the Court. May Nino rest in God's peace. John C. Meditz '66, Board Chair; Dan Denihan '65, Vice Chair; Jack Raslowsky, President 1/3
